trans-unit.source: Provides access to controls that you add to the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 提供对添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的控件的访问。

trans-unit.source: When you add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to your project, Visual Studio automatically assigns a new <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu> object to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.OfficeMenu%2A> property of the generated <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon> interface.
trans-unit.target: 当你将添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项到你的项目，Visual Studio 将自动分配一个新<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu>对象传递给<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.OfficeMenu%2A>属性生成<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon>接口。

trans-unit.source: Use this object to add new controls to the Microsoft Office Menu at run time, or to access controls that you added to the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 此对象用于将新控件添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单上，在运行时，或添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单上的访问控制。

trans-unit.source: You can add controls at run time, but only before the Ribbon is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，但只能在加载功能区之前，你可以添加控件。

trans-unit.source: Create an instance of the control, and then add the new control to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建该控件的实例，然后添加到新的控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: The following example iterates through the custom controls on the Ribbon Office menu and displays their name.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例循环访问功能区 Office 菜单上的自定义控件，并显示其名称。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project.
trans-unit.target: 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项到 Office 项目。

trans-unit.source: Add a button to the Microsoft Office Button.
trans-unit.target: 将按钮添加到 Microsoft Office 按钮。

trans-unit.source: Set the **(Name)** property of the button to `myOfficeMenuButton`.
trans-unit.target: 设置**（名称）**到按钮属性`myOfficeMenuButton`。

trans-unit.source: Set the **PositionType** property to **AfterOfficeID** under the **Position** property.
trans-unit.target: 设置**PositionType**属性**AfterOfficeID**下**位置**属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the **OfficeID** property to **FilePrintMenu** under the **Position** property.
trans-unit.target: 设置**OfficeID**属性**FilePrintMenu**下**位置**属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Ribbon controls that you added to the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的功能区控件。

trans-unit.source: The collection of Ribbon controls that you added to the Microsoft Office Menu at design time or run time.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时或运行时添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的功能区控件集合。

trans-unit.source: You can add controls at run time, but only before the Ribbon is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，但只能在加载功能区之前，你可以添加控件。

trans-unit.source: Create an instance of the control, and then add the new control to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建该控件的实例，然后添加到新的控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you add controls to the Microsoft Office Menu by using the Ribbon Designer, Visual Studio automatically adds the controls to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用功能区设计器可将控件添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单中，在 Visual Studio 会自动添加到控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu.Items%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You try to add, remove, or replace a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl" /> after the Ribbon is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 加载功能区后，尝试添加、移除或替换 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl" />。
